fibonacci-series
=========

Fibonacci series implementation for nodejs.

Usage
-----

```js
const fibonacci = require ('fibonacci-series');
const numberArray = fibonacci(5);
console.log (numberArray);
```

Result:

```js
[ 1, 1, 2, 3, 5 ]
```

Installation
------------

`npm i fibonacci-series --save`
